channel.title: changes made to Tor Browser documentation page
channel.description:
i have updated this page , and as summary i will mention what i have done:-
1- changed the old image of [TorCheck](https://check.torproject.org/) , the [image](https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=File:This-Browser-is-Using-Tor.png&filetimestamp=20170105235923&)
2- updating [HTTPS-Encryption section](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#HTTPS_Encryption) by:-
- removing lavabit website screenshot and replacing it with our website screenshot - adding screenshots provided by EFF regarding user connection models with/without Tor/HTTPS
3- updating [HTTPS everywhere](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#HTTPS_Everywhere) logo to the latest one
4- updating [Tor Browser Downloader](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Updating) screenshots
5- updating [Installation Confirmation Screen](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Installation_Confirmation_Screen) screenshot
6- Document [File Downloads section](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#File_Downloads) with screenshots and text

item.title: changes made to Tor Browser documentation page
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i have updated this page , and as summary i will mention what i have done:-

1- changed the old image of TorCheck , the image

2- updating HTTPS-Encryption section by:-

  • removing lavabit website screenshot and replacing it with our website screenshot
  • adding screenshots provided by EFF regarding user connection models with/without Tor/HTTPS

3- updating HTTPS everywhere logo to the latest one

4- updating Tor Browser Downloader screenshots

5- updating Installation Confirmation Screen screenshot

6- Document File Downloads section with screenshots and text

Read full topic
